attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WHAT HAPPENS TO INNOCENT CITIZENS WHO ARE ARRESTED FALSELY AS TERRORIST AND HOW THEIR FAMILY LIFE IS DESTROYED.

I HAVE LIVED 36 YEARS IN THIS COUNTRY AND FALSLELY ARRESTED UNDER ANTITERRORIST LAW, THRICE , MY FAMILY ARE LIVING IN  A "SAFE" HOUSE. MY WHOLE FAMILY LIFE HAS BEEN DESTROYED.

WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO ANN AND ALAN KEEN , MY 2 LOCAL MP'S?

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
